topic.title: Addresses
topic.p: The Addresses list contains all of your contacts and mailing lists. In this window you can add, delete, edit, and write to contacts in your Address book.

ol.title: To add a contact using Quick Add:

li.p: In the Address Book menu group, click Addresses (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary).

ol.li:
Under Quick Add, type the contact information you want in the appropriate fields.
Note: Only an email address is required.
Click Add. A message appears informing you that the Address was added.

ol.title: To Add a Detailed Contact:

li.p: In the Address Book menu group, click Add Contact (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary).

ol.li:
Type the contact information you want in the appropriate fields.
Note: Only an email address is required.
Click Save or Save/Create Another. A message appears informing you that your new contact has been added.

ol.title: To delete a contact or list:

li.p: In the Address Book menu group, click Addresses (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary).

ol.li: Select the check boxes for the contacts and lists you want to delete.
Click Delete. A message appears asking if you are sure you want to delete the selected items.
Click OK. A message appears informing you that the selected items have been deleted.

ol.title: To Edit a Contact Or List:

li.p: In the Address Book menu group, click Addresses (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary).

ol.li: Click edit for the contact or list you want to edit. The Edit Contact or Edit Distribution List window appears.
Click Save. A message appears informing you that your changes have been saved.
